summary: The diff implements a single-page envelope-to-letter reveal UI with Tailwind-based Valentine styling and a cohesive rose/pink theme, but it appears to miss the exact envelope label text requirement and introduces unrequested Internet Identity/auth-related scaffolding plus an unrequested backend canister stub.

missing_requirements.reason: The envelope renders the emoji (ğŸ’Œ) as a separate element and the text as â€œClick to Openâ€ without including â€œğŸ’Œâ€ in the same label string.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/provider and identity-aware actor creation (auth scaffolding and react-query invalidation).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists Internet Identity authentication as a non-goal, yet the diff adds InternetIdentityProvider usage and associated hooks for login/identity/actor.
The request is frontend-only and does not mention adding or changing backend code; persistence is a non-goal.
